Her growth halted as her eyes fluttered open.

Immediately, Hancock felt an intense pressure all over her body, like someone had placed her in a vice and was slowly cranking the handle. She glanced around her, but the first thing to catch her eye was a spectacular view of her breasts, half an inch away from her face.
"What the-" she began to say as she attempted to sit up.
Shrrrip!
As if someone had removed every stitch from her clothing, Hancock's attire slipped off of her, leaving her bare, white skin exposed to the night. The Pirate Empress feared the worst and immediately ran to her wardrobe, hoping someone had not tried to see what she was hiding on her back. Or rather she would have, had she not slammed her foot into the tiled floor and fallen on her face.
Huh? How did that happen? It was almost as if my bed was lower to the ground, she thought, quickly scrambling to her feet and promptly smacking her head head against the top of the door frame of her walk-in wardrobe. Once again on the floor, Hancock writhed (more in annoyance than in pain) and muttered expletives under her breath, before finally crawling, with as much fervour as she could muster, into her wardrobe and slamming the door shut.
Inside, she turned on some personal lighting and quickly threw on a coat, readying herself for whoever or whatever was in her bedroom.

No-one.
Much to Hancock's surprise, a search of her bedroom revealed no trace of an intruder, or any other disturbance other than her clothing. And much more to her surprise, she found that her bed was the same distance to the floor that it always was.
"What in the world is going on here?" muttered Hancock, perplexed. Her attention then found itself drawn to the door frame she had collided with earlier. She was eye-level with it. Her eyes widened as she came to the inevitable conclusion. "T-that's..."
A single glance downwards confirmed her suspicions. Her panties, wrapped all-too-snugly around her wide hips, told her everything. She barely had to pop her hip out to snap the overworked fabric.
"I've grown...bigger."
Hancock stood dumbfounded for what seemed like eternity, before her brain decided to tell her to do something.

Scream.

Marigold and Sandersonia thundered down the hallway towards Hancock's room, Half-Zoan forms at the ready. They smashed the poor doors off of their handles for a second time in two days.
"Hancock! What's happened?" they yelled in unison. They spotted their barely covered sibling, panting heavily and pointing towards her wardrobe. The flew to her side, bracing themselves for whatever fiendish thing awaited them.
After staring at her closet for a good minute, Sandersonia asked the question that was plaguing her mind: "Didn't you get over this when you were like, five?"
Hancock flipped her head around towards the owner of her voice. "What on Earth are you talking about?" she breathed.
Both sisters returned to their full human forms and crossed their respective arms. Marigold spoke. "You know, being scared of monsters in your closet." The two of them broke into laughter.
Hancock stared at them in disbelief. Her eyes flew upwards towards the top of the door frame. "That's not it! Can't you idiots see that I'm-"
Wait. Upwards?
Throwing any sort of backwards logic Hancock had gained in the past five minutes out of the window, she discovered that she was back at her original size of 6'3. If her eyes could've widened any further, Eneru would have mistaken them for two more moons. "How is this possible? Maybe I was just dreaming?"
She spoke to no-one, as her sisters had just chuckled themselves back to bed, leaving Hancock alone again with her thoughts

Sighing, the raven-haired beauty crept back into bed with a new set of pajamas on. However, before she could clamber on in, she noticed the shredded remains of her previous attire.
I knew it! It wasn't just a dream! she thought. Wait a second, a dream. Hancock recalled what she was thinking about before she had awoken. Her heart fluttered. "Oh, Luffy. If you saw me like this, would we still be together?" She mentally slapped herself. Again. "I can't think about him. But it's so weird, I've never had to stop myself before."
A lightbulb went off in her head.
"Maybe because I kept my feelings of love inside me, it built up somehow? And when I released them it all in that dream, I grew? I know it's called the Love-Love fruit, but..." As much as she wanted to waive that thought, she decided that a simple test would suffice.
If she dreamed about Luffy again (in which she was pretty much guaranteed) and didn't grow, she would try the same thing in two night's time.

13411121.content:
The Pirate Empress awoke the next morning with a splitting headache. It felt as if someone was pressing their knuckles into her temples; she winced at the pain as she sat up. The next thing the raven-haired beauty noticed was that she was stark naked, with goosebumps running all over her white skin. The last thing she took note of (and in retrospect, was probably the first thing she should've taken note of,) was the fact that her body took up about a quarter of her large bedroom.
Hancock placed a shaky hand on her forehead in an attempt to recall the events of the night prior. Almost immediately, she remembered her body's rapid expansion, and the intense feelings of love that had ravaged her being. Then, she remembered how good the sensation of growing bigger felt. Feeling her own power increasing, as well as her ability to dominate others increase - it made Hancock squirm just thinking about it. Her bed creaked loudly in response to her movement, breaking the Pirate Empress out of her lustful stupor.
It was at this point that Hancock heard some light, tapping footsteps, growing louder and louder as they approached her. She put a hand to her mouth. She hadn't thought about the mark on her back. It would be easy for anyone to see it if she was eleven feet tall.
Calm down! she thought to herself hastily. It could be Sonia or Mari on the other side of that door.
"Empress?"
Crap.
Hancock was about to order the servant to leave her alone, but stopped herself. If I were to talk right now, the volume of my voice would give me away completely! What do I do? The giant woman racked her brain for a solution (including for an instant, the thought of how no-one had her euphoric sounds from the previous night [which she later on put down to dumb luck]) when she remembered something from the first time she had grown.
I can shrink! But how, how did I do it?
The servant rapped on the door and called out again. Hancock entered panic mode as she watched the door starting to slowly budge open.
She was done, her secret was out. She and her sisters would have to leave Amazon Lily forever. Hancock squeezed her eyes shut, trying to not scream. This was it.
Suddenly, the Pirate Empress felt as if she had released an enormous breath of air. She opened her eyes quickly to catch the world seeming to grow around her, or rather, her body dwindling in size. Wasting no time, Hancock flew underneath her bed covers the second the servant stepped inside the room.
"Empress...? Are you ready for breakfast?"
The servant was nearly blasted out of the room by the sound of her master's voice. "Peasant! How dare you make me follow my own schedule! I eat whenever I wish! Now leave!"
Hancock nearly cried with relief when the befuddled servant left her presence.

I think I can now confirm that fear and panic make me shrink, whereas love and lust makes me grow, thought the Snake Empress as she made her way towards the Amazon Lily market place. Perhaps it is a Ying and Yang sort of thing? Well, it doesn't matter as long as I know how it works. The raven-haired beauty smiled to herself. Now all I have to do is learn how to control it.
This was the precise reason that Hancock found herself in a less-regal context than she was accustomed to. She was on the prowl for a pawn to test her newfound power on, and see if it affected others in some way. It didn't take long for her eyes to trace across the perfect test-subject.

15122.content:
While the Strawhats crew went to to a nearby town for supplies, Usopp and Chopper decided to go fishing on board the Thousand Sunny hoping to wrangle up some fishes until Brook came running to them, holding a small chest.

"Yohohoho! Usopp-san! Chopper-san! Look what I just found!" Brook exclaimed.

"Oh wow,a treasure chest! Where did you get that from?" Usopp asked him.

"I found it near the Thousand Sunny, I guess it float all the way here. It does look kinda old since it's all covered by algae...Yohoho shall we take a pee?"

"Are...Are you sure it's okay to open it? Don't we wanna show it to the other guys?" Chopper said with a worry tone knowing Nami will think they are stealing the treasure-Well her treasures.

"Hmm that is true...Maybe just a quick peek and just pretend we found it and show it to them, that way we won't get caught! Alright Brook, open the chest!"

Brook places the chest on the ground and slowly opens the chest, Usopp and Chopper moves in closer just waiting to see what kind of treasure in it. As the chest is fully open to see, the trio was surprise to see...Two green glowing crystal in each different sizes

"Huh...That's it? Just two jewels? Well that's kinda a let down." Usopp sighed. "Oh well, we better close it up before Nami gets back."

"Hold on a minute...I noticed these jewels somewhere...But I can't remember, but I definitely know them." Chopper said while thinking about the jewels. "Maybe I can take one of them and examine it."

"Allow me, Chopper-san yohoho." Brook reach into the chest and grabs...
15122.title: The Adventures of the Shrunken Scaredy Trio

151222.content:
Brook reached for the smallest crystal, barely even noticeable it was so small. It had to be less than an inch in height and does look kinda worthless. "Here you go Chopper-san." Brook handed the small crystal to Chopper.

"Brook! This one is way smaller than the other one!...But it'll have to do."Chopper examines the crystal."Hmm...This shape...The glowing green light...Wait a minute..This is-" Just as Chopper about to tell them about this crystal, the crystal's green light begin to grow brighter and engulfs the three Strawhats!

"What the hell is going on here!?" Usopp screams in terror.

"Oh my! I'm blinded by this light!!...Oh wait, I don't have eyes...Yohohoho!" Brook laugh at his usual Skull Jokes, then he notices the green light suddenly disappear. "Oh? The crystal stops shining?"

Usopp and Chopper opens their eyes, everything seems normal: The skies are clear and blue and they are still on the Thousand Sunny... "Huh..I wonder what that all about...H-Hey Chopper! Where is the crystal?" Usopp notice the small crystal that Chopper had is gone. "Oh no! Did someone took it!? Oh man, Nami is gonna kill us!" Usopp started to shake in fear.

"No Usopp! No one was near us when it started to glow...And I figure out what those crystals are." Chopper said to them. "The crystals are called Microtation, it posses a very dangerous curse that anyone who pick up any two of them from the chest, it'll start glowing bright green and then the chest will disappear along with the Microtations."

"Ahh no wonder the chest is gone." Brook looks around for the chest.

"S-S-So..I-Is the curse has already affected us...? Wh-What kinda of cures is it..?" Usopp still shaken in fear.

"That I don't know, I haven't read much about it...Anyway, we better go find Luffy and the others and tell them what happen-" Suddenly they heard a loud booming sound.

BOOM!!

Caught entirely off guard, the three fell flat as the entire ground seemed to quake."What was that!? Was that an earthquake!?" Chopper looks around fragility.

BOOM!!

Another quake, this one louder and stronger. Once again, the three fall to the ground. "Another earthquake!? Is the Marines attacking us!?" Usopp yells.

BOOOOOOOM!!!!!

Suddenly, a gigantic foot wear of some giant-sized person landed right before them, creating a quake strong enough to send them flying and landed flat on the ground again. The three huddles together in fear and looked up to this mile or two sized figure that is even bigger than Oars. They know it's a woman due to her large chest and feminine body.

"Who...Is...That...?" Usopp nearly gone silent after what just happen.

"Oh my...She's gigantic...Maybe her panties is gigantic sized too, yohohoho." Brook said, thinking about panties but was interrupted by Usopp as he slapped him on the head.

"Wait a minute! I know who it is!!" Chopper said as he recognize this monstrous sized woman. "That gigantic woman is really..."

The trio continues to climb Robin's high heel when suddenly..

15131.content:
"Ugh...Where am I?"

"Yohohoho, I feel like my head's ready to split."

"Ow..."

One by one, the Strawhat pirates awoke. None of them remembered anything about falling asleep but here they were, all awakening alongside each other. After a couple minutes they had all awakened. All seven of them: Luffy, Zoro, Usopp, Sanji, Chopper, Franky, and Brooke.

"Where are we?" Sanji was the first to clear his head enough to realize they were in a new place. On all sides were brown, going on for miles in every direction in a totally flat, smooth plain. In the distance they could make out enormous, indistinct structures but that was it. They didn't resemble buildings or anything really. Not a single one of the pirates recognized the place.

"Am I dreaming?" Luffy immediately asked.

"No, if I was dreaming there'd be panties. Yohohohoho." Brooke laughed giddily at his joke.

"Do mine count?" Franky shrugged. "Actually we are short on a couple people."

"Where are Nami and Robin?!?!" Once he realized they weren't there Sanji was jumping all over the place screaming their names. Somehow he found his way to Zoro, getting into his face. "Where are they Moss Head?!"

Zoro shrugged, barely paying him mind. "Why do you think I know?"

Sanji gritted his teeth and readied a loud insult for Zoro when thunderous booms shook everything around them, forcing the pirates to cover their ears.

"It looks like they woke up Robin."

"So it does."

There was no mistaking those voices, even though they were louder than anyone had ever heard them before. Those were the voices of Nami and Robin, their missing crew mates. But where were they? The Strawhats looked all around them but it was still the same brown fields in every direction.

"G-G-G-GUYS!!!!"

Everyone looked to Chopper. The reindeer was pale as a ghost, staring at the sky above them with a horrified look. Curious, the rest of the crew did the same thing; and in an instant they all have the same look Chopper did.

The "sky" so to speak, was blocked out by two immense, familiar faces. Looming in the heavens Nami and Robin smiled down at them, larger than anything they had ever seen before. The two were giantesses who made even Oar's look like an ant.

"Wow guys. You're so big!" Luffy immediately screamed the obvious.

Robin giggled, "Told you."

Nami looked to the other girl with a smile, "You were right. He said it."

The other giantess looked back to their crew, "We aren't big Captain. You all are small."

"You mean we shrank?!" Usopp leapt back, holding Chopper tightly for comfort.

"Mmhm." Nami nodded. "To make a long story short me and Robin were a little bored so we came up with this idea to have a bit of fun with you guys."

"Somehow I doubt you both came up with it." Zoro stared suspiciously at Nami who smiled innocently.

"How the heck did you guys shrink us?" Franky was quick to ask.

"That's not important. Just know we shrank you guys down. And now, time for our fun!"

"Fun?" The shrunken crew all asked together.

The giantesses exchanged a smirk with one another before backing away from what was merely a table. But to their crew it was the endless field of brown. Both women leaned back in their seats and lazily propped their feet up onto the table, placing them close to their shrunken crew.

"Put simply..." Robin began.

"You're going to worship us!" Nami finished.

"Like hell we are!"

"Anything for you my lovely Goddesses!!!" Sanji swooned, more than happy to worship either of his lovely crew mates.

"Someone gets the idea." Robin giggled. "If you don't mind, I wouldn't mind a foot massage."

"On it Goddess Robin!" Sanji saluted the giantess and took off running to her foot.

"I guess that leaves the rest of you with me." Nami grinned down at the others. "What should I do with you?"

"Why are you guys doing this? Not that I mind Yohohoho."

Nami shrugged, "Does a girl need a reason to have a good time? Now you little ants. You should..." She paused to think about what to do.
15131.title: Shrunken by Nami and Robin
