151331211212112212.content:
Luffy let out a massive sigh of relief as he slammed himself face first into a a coat of yellow ear wax, breathing heavily and not even minding how gross the situation was. The trip up to Robin's ear had been in the very best a microscopic escapade for the shrunken captain. Being so small, everything was escalated to the highest of dangers and actions for him, and trying to climb a moving 'goddess' while being smaller than a mite of dust was quite the task, but nobody could say Luffy hadn't accomplished the impossible before.

His rubber body, incredible durability, strength, speed, and indomitable willpower had been factors that had aided him in his little adventure across Robin's titanic form. He had found himself lost in the fabric threads of her clothing for a while, fallen right back down into her bountiful cleavage and struggled to free himself from the soft fleshy grip of her two luscious orbs, somehow ended up inside one of her nostrils, and eventually ended up dangling from the very bottom of her ear lobe. Not wanting to risk another massively multi-mile plummet once again, he ricocheted himself up like a slingshot with his elastic limbs, occasionally having to grab another patch of skin and send himself flying upwards again. Eventually, he had reached the bottom edge of the ear canal, which is where he now found himself.

After a minute's break, Luffy lifted himself back up to his feet, stretching to work out a few kinks in his muscles. Every so often he could hear a distant boom echoing far away, a combination of Robin walking, breathing, and simply moving. Her speech alone acted as a magnified thunderstorm, but she had gone quiet now. The Strawhat had been there with her conversation, so at least he knew what was going on. Very simple plan, get Robin's attention, find the micro village and restore his crew back to fighting size. Easy and simple in his mind.

He gazed out into the vast, vast cavern of the insides of his archaeologist's ear. It was dark for sure, barely illuminated from the light filtering in from the opening, and nearly every last inch was covered in varying layers of thickness of wax. To a normal sized person, all of this was barely even noticeable, but to one the stature of Luffy, even the most miniscule of details was noticeable and enlarged greatly. "Yuck." Luffy gagged, sticking out his tongue and spitting out a large chunk of yellow goo.

"Yosh! Let's see if I can get Robin to hear me." He said to himself, cupping his hands around his mouth and began shouting. "Oi! Robin! It's me, Luffy!" He yelled, but no reply came from the giga giantess. He repeated shouting that a couple times before he began shouting louder and louder by the second, screaming nearly. He was none for being a loudmouth at times. Finally, the puny pirate had had enough and was impatient.

"Hmmph." Luffy huffed, taking a deep breath in and sucking in air quickly. His entire torso began to swell and expand with the large intake of air, his rubber form ballooning out in a ridiculously cartoony way. When he was satisfied with how much he had breathed in, now roughly three times his original size and looking quite silly, Luffy let it out. "ROBIN! IT'S ME, LUFFY! I'M INSIDE YOUR EAAAAAARRRRRRRRR!" He let loose his voice, echoing inside the massive cave of her ear canal, expelling out every bit of air and shouting at the top of his lungs. The question is though, did Robin hear her tiny captain?
151331211212112212.title: Getting the Goddess's Attention

151332.content: How about everyone but Nami shrinks?
151332.title: Except for Nami?

choices: She picks them all up for a closer look
She raises her big toe and lowers it down onto them
15133211.content:
A small rocking motion awoke the captain of the Strawhat Pirates. Now, it was expected for a pirate ship to rock to and fro while on the open seas, but this one was much more violent and forced than the gentle waves that carried them on through the night. A possible storm was coming up, sending the waves into a choppy motion. Monkey D. Luffy jumped up and snatched his signature strawhat from around his neck, positioning it on his head. He grinned as he stepped on deck, expecting pouring rain to greet him. He always loved storms. The violent swaying of the ship, the thrill of standing in hurricanes and typhoons whilst his crew scurried about to procure the safety of the ship. It gave him joy like no other. Expect maybe meat, meat was good. Really good. It was one of the best things ever to him. But instead of black skies and a writhing ocean, all he saw was a blurry outlined world with a big, peach-colored mountain in front of them. Somehow, the Thousand Sunny had ended up on solid ground in front of a mountain. Now, odder things had happened to them before, but this was definitely up there in the strange factor. An entire ocean just doesn't get up and dissapear. At least, not without reason in this zany world.

One by one the remainder of the crew left their quarters and stood around Luffy, each one grumbling in a different manner to their interrupted sleep. All except one...

"Oi! What was that racket earlier?!"Zoro grunted out, rubbing his green hair back into it's spikes.

"Dunno."Luffy shrugged with his usual grin."But there's a mountain here now."He pointed behind him.

"How does a mountain just pop up right in the middle of an ocean?"Sanji questioned, already lighting a cigarette and taking slow, smooth puffs of it, clouds of grey slowly rising with his breath.

"Oh, there is no ocean now!"

"..."

"Maybe the mountain drained it all away? Like...it fell out of the sky and made a big hole that sucked up all the water!"The juvenile captain allowed his imagination to play on this one.

"That's highly unlikely..."Robin pertained to the conversation, looking over the side of the ship, finding that Luffy's words rang true. Nothing but a dry terrain that appeared to be a consistency of wood greeted her."...He's right. How very...odd."

"All ashore that's going ashore!"Luffy exclaimed as he jumped overboard, landing on the ground with a light tick of his sandals. The rest followed, Sanji and Zoro landing lightly next to Luffy, Ussop and Chopper bumbling out, Robin daintily using her devil fruit power to create a stairway of hands to descend down upon, Brooks tumbling to the ground in a heap of clattering bones, and Franky to come down a heavy metallic crash. They all looked out towards the only recognizable landmark for miles, that mountain. It was big, as all mountains were, but it seemed to be part of a mountain range, a series of smaller mountains beside it in a set of five, each one an odd skin color and giving off a peculiar odor that wafted heavily through the air.

"....Wanna go explore it?"Luffy asked, only to dash off without getting any real answer from his crew. He knew they'd follow anyway. In only a minute's time they were all running towards the mountain, not knowing what they were to expect when they reached it. They've run into many a curious things across their travels, ranging from men trapped in treasure chests to warring giants to cities in the skies, so anything that lived on this mountain was bound to be eccentric, or at least helpful to them for getting their ship back onto the ocean and find their missing mapmaker.

When they approached it thirty minutes later, the strength of the smell that permeated the air only intensified, giving off a scent of sweat and feet."Man...this stinks."Luffy said through a pinched nose."I thought that this would be another fun adventure...not one that smelled bad."

"Well, this mountain does seem....toelike? I want to say it's toelike..."Robin replied, approaching the base of the mountain and placing a hand against it, surprised to find that the surface was incredibly soft, and upon further inspection, gave off the texture of a print that skin would hold. As curious as her, each of the strawhats placed their palm against the colossal object, stroking it and rubbing their hands up and down to try and figure out whatever this mountain was made of.

"Ahhh..."

"...?"Luffy looked around, expecting one of his nakama to be the source of the satisfied sound, but each one was too busy with examining the mountain.

"That feels nice...a little massage..."

Again, but this time more thunderous, as if coming from above. Luffy gazed up past the summit of the mountain to see if he could make out whatever laid beyond it, and was surprised to find an eye staring back down at him.

"Hey guys."

"What?"

"We're touching a giant."He pointed up to the eye, and immediately they all jumped away from the mountain, now obviously a giant's toe. But they had never seen such a massive being, one that even dwarfed the mighty Oars with such stature.

"Hello!"Luffy called up, obviously unfazed by the giant.

"Hi Luffy."The giant called down, the voice sounding awfully feminine. They were dealing with a giantess instead.

"How'd you know my name?"

"Kinda obvious, isn't it?"

A sound of wind and movement, and the giantess leaned down closer, filling the sky with her face. A mile-wide grin from Nami greeted them, and they all were in shock."Nami?!"

"Yup!"She giggled, a roar to the smaller pirates."Isn't it neat! The shrinking worked!"

"You...you shrank us?!"

"At first I thought that it wouldn't work...y'know how unreliable merchants can be, but that gem I bought the other day,"She pulled it out, a very bland stone in appearance, but apparently with magical properties."It actually shrank you guys! And you're all so cute too."The orange-headed woman chuckled. Indeed they were small. She gauged they were all about a fraction of an inch tall, and the Thousand Sunny was simply a small toy she could cup in the palm of her hand.

"Could you uh....make us bigger?"

"Nope."

"Whaddaya mean, 'NOPE'?!"Zoro shouted, obvious anger in his voice.

"Oh Nami-swan, I don't care if I'm big or small, you're still a beautiful sight to behold."Sanji swooned over the gigantic woman with hearts in his eyes.

"Can it, lover-boy!"Zoro threatened the chef.

"Why won't you return us to our normal heights, Nami?"Robin asked, ever the logical voice amidst a troupe of clowns she called friends.

"I was thinking we could play a bit, y'know..."She giggled, only her tone didn't sound playful at all.
15133211.title: Nami and Her Shrunken Crewmates

choices: She's about to go a nice walk through the local shopping areas
Nami relocates her crew to a different place
151332112.content:
"I'd love to play with you any day my lovely Nami!" Sanji excitedly shouted as he danced eagerly in place. Of all his companions he was the only one so eager though, except perhaps Brooke who seemed at a loss for words..

"P-Play...?" Chopper repeated hopefully, eyeing the other Straw Hats for guidance. His gaze fell upon Usopp who reacted promptly by sweating his outfit wet and nervously stammering out, "At your size the slightest little move can crush us Nami, don't do this. I have Do-Not-Want-To-Be-Crushed Syndrome!"

"Sounds like fun!" Came a shout followed by their captain's hearty laughter.

"Easy for you to say Mr. Rubber Man! If you get crushed you'll just get flattened and puff back out like a balloon!"

"I actually wouldn't mind seeing that. It could be a fascinating test of his powers." Robin calmly chirped in, completely confident Nami wouldn't hurt them.

As each of the minute specks between her toes kept playing off each other Nami only continued to look at them with her grin.To them she was the giant of giants, bigger than anything else in the sea. To her they just looked like an array of dirt specks between her toes, less than ants. What she was about to do felt almost natural given the differences in their stature. With a soft couple taps of her toes she rumbled her sandals enough all her companions fell on their bottoms. Ha! Even my toes make them tremble! She thought playfully, next came the fun part. While everyone was flat on their backs and eyes up above them a familiar shadow engulfed any light for miles. Nami's big toe was now directly over all of her friends, and it didn't take a genius to figure out what came next.

"She's gonna crush us!!!!!!" The shrill shriek of Usopp was predictable, as was him fumbling to his feet and running for it. Run as fast as you want you will never leave my big toe in time.

"Nami what are you doing?!" That one sounded high-pitched enough to be Chopper but Nami couldn't be sure.

"Just taking care of a few bugs." The giantess smiled smugly as her toe lowered itself onto the group, crushing all of them beneath it's massive form. Small as they were nothing ever felt as satisfying as seeing everyone struggle against the lowest part of Nami's body and fail miserably. She could see Usopp, Chopper, and Brooke all run for their lives. She spotted the others all try to fight off her toe in a single, unified attack. None of it made a difference. It didn't even tickle. The Straw Hat's were bested by the big toe of a redhead not even trying. Funny enough the most feeling Nami got out of the few seconds it took was the final squish of feeling all their bodies against her toe.

Now to check...

Nami raised her toe again to find nothing where it once was. None of her friends nor any blood or signs there were injured. "There's no way..." She said with half a laugh. The gigantess tilted her foot slightly to examine the bottom of her toe. Sure enough, everyone was their, trapped in the ridges of her toe print like bits of dirt. It was just too much, Nami burst out into hysterical laughter at the sight. It took a minute for her to calm down enough to gently scrape all of the bodies from her toe back to their spots between them. They were all a bit battered and disgruntled but otherwise the Straw Hats were all fine; as the Navigator knew they would be. She gave them all a moment to regain themselves, half tempted to squeeze her toes together to re-live the fun she had mere moments ago. But she kept herself in check and held in the urge...for now.

"WHAT THE HELL WAS THAT FOR?!?!"

That angry roar could only belong to Zoro, not surprising he would be the first to get upset. "Just a bit of fun." Nami shrugged nonchalantly.

"You could've killed us!" Shrill and terrified, definitely Usopp again.

"But I didn't." Nami winked, "The same guy who gave me this also told me anything I shrank would be fine. People and objects once shrunken can't be crushed. " She toyed with her gem between her fingers while explaining it all. "Once I found out it actually shrank you guys I figured the rest was true too."

"What if it wasn't?"

The silence that the giantess responded with wasn't very encouraging. "But you guys lived just fine so it's all good right?!" She perked up immediately.

"Like hell! I got some of your damn foot caught in my mouth. When was the last time you washed?!"

"Yohohoho...I have to say Nami as lovely as you are at this size. I'd rather not go through that again."

"That was kind of fun!" Nami saw the speck-sized Zoro smack their Captain over the head for that one.

"You guys might wanna take some of Luffy's enthusiasm. I'm just getting started." Nami's eyes caught that scary gleam she only had when there was profit in it for her. "After all, I got a bunch more toes." It was mainly a coy, playful little threat but she fully intended to follow through should one of her friends upset her.

"Why are you doing this Nami?" Robin asked.

The large-brown eyes shifted to the only shrunken woman in the group, "No real reason though I guess if I had to have one...it would probably be because I'm the weakest in the crew. I mean, even Usopp could beat me!"

"I-I could...?"

"-So just once I want to know what it's like to be the ridiculously strong here one. Strong enough with the slightest whim I can dominate you in every way."

"You can dominate me all day Nami!!!" Sanji briefly calmed down when things got serious but now that he knew it was safe he was back to his perverted self.

"Shut it!" Nami responded by stomping her toe again with a dark grin. When her toe raised she saw the specks fall back to her sandal's sole. "I'm bored of talking. From now on it'll just be what I want. And the first rule of Queen Nami is no more bugs talking to me!"

"Queen Nami? What are you dru-" Another toe stomp.

Nami relished in the devious role she cast herself in. "I can do this all day. But I have other things planned for you all..."
151332112.title: Massive Navigator

choices: The crew escapes from under her toe and begins to climb Nami
1513321121.content:
Nami smirked as he wiggled her big toe, relishing the power of feeling eight other tiny dirt specks she knew as her crewmates underneath it. The gem's power it gave her was so amazing, she felt invincible, and to the tiny Strawhats, she was. Just with a thought and a flash, she could shrink anything she desired, from a person to a whole island. She would definitely have to play with the gem's powers later on, but for now she had tinies to deal with and plenty of collected cash to spend in a marketplace.

She lifted up her toe more slowly this time, smirking as she saw the specks all flattened onto the bed of her sandal. She shifted her foot slightly so that they were once again positioned tween her toes. "Now, listen up." She boomed in a stern, waggling a finger down at them. "Queen Nami is going to go out shopping." The navigator proclaimed in a most mock-regal tone. She once again giggled to herself. Queen Nami! Goddess Nami!

"And while I'm out and about, I expect you specks to be doing some work down there for me." The redhead went on, hearing squeaks and disgruntled voices from the smaller specks below. She figured it was either Zoro or Franky complaining, but she ignored them for now. Really couldn't hear their tiny voices anyway unless she focused on them and listened intently. Now they were just a minor nuisance compared to her no doubt booming and godlike voice.

"What kinda work?" The green-haired swordsman asked upwards to Nami's looming form cautiously.

"Oh Nami-swan, I'd do any kind of work for you." Sanji called up joyously with hearts in his eyes, no doubt the only one who was truly enjoying the entire situation at the moment. He had always treated Nami as a goddess, and here she was like one before them.

"I'll be keeping you all on my foot for safety." She smirked, knowing that was one of the most unsafe places for a walking giantess such as herself to them. "You'll all be safely snuggled under my toe while I'm out at the market. And while you're under it, I expect the works from my servants. Massages, kisses, praise, Queen-Goddess Nami demands it!" She boomed, deciding to combine the two titles for her own pleasure.

"Now wait just a moment-"

She didn't know who defied her word, only that it was silenced when her more than mountainous toe was raised overhead once and lowered, smushing them all into submission.

She picked up the tiny Thousand Sunny that laid on the edge of her sandal bed and smirked, depositing it into her cleavage alongside the size-changing gem and stood up, stretching happily. The redhead wiggled her toes giddily and smushed her feet down harder than she normally needed to, strutting out of the inn she was currently staying at and heading into town. Oh, she knew today would be a good day.

---

"Mfffmmmfffm!"

"Luffy, move your face a bit. You're stuck under a ridge of skin that sticks out a bit more."

The captain gasped for air as he jerked his head to the side, making a rubbery snap with the movement. "What the hell is up with Nami?!" He shouted, struggling to free himself, but the massive sky of toeflesh held them all down with it's immeasurable weight.

Occasionally their whole world would lift up, and they felt entirely weightless, only for the toe to slam back down on them, an act of Nami walking so devastating and powerful, generating earthquakes and ear-splitting booms for them.

"I don't know, but I'm loving it!" Sanji shouted in reply, hands working against the soft skin and peppering the titanic appendage with kisses. Every member of the pirate crew only sighed and waited, bracing themselves for every impact of the goddess's steps.
1513321121.title: Shopping Spree With Friends

15133212.content:
On the Thousand Sunny, all was peaceful. Nami was tanning herself on the beach, enjoying the beautiful sun. All the others were on the boat, enjoying their day, doing usual stuff. But suddenly:

"Ha ha", said a feminine voice. "With the help of the fruit of size, I will destroy the Strawhat crew and get the reward!"

The girl was a beautiful woman, with the body and the size of Nami (Note: We are on the 2 years later arc), except she had a long blue air and blue eyes. She then focused her power in the direction of the Thousand Sunny.

"Here we go! Mini mini ray!"

She fired a pink ray who enveloped the whole ship. Then, before the eyes of the woman, the boat shrinks, and shrinks, and then get the size of a bath toy.

"Ha ha ha! Now, all I have to do is going get the reward! Their boat will not surivive on this sea, even if the sea is peaceful!"

And with that, she disappeared in the jungle. On the boat, all were suprising to see the little sea waves being now a real tsunami. The Thousand Sunny was tough, but it wouldn't resist last.

"Franky!" said Luffy, "Do a Coup de Burst!"

"Okay!" said the cyborg, "COUP DE BURST!!!"

The ship then shot out the usual air canon, and fly in direction of the island. They keep flying, and quit the sea. They were now flying above the sand. They began to lose altitude, and they were hanging on the ship, prepared for the rough landing. But when they landed, the landing was not so rough. There was a good explication: They landed on the body of the Bikini Nami, who had no see them, sleeping peacefully.

"G-Giant Nami-swan!" said Sanji, while having a massive nosebledd.

"Nami! We are here!" said Usopp.

All the crew was now yelling the name of Nami, and Nami began to stir.

"Mmh... Can't they do less noise? That idiots."

She wakes up, and see the now little ship.

"Huh?" said Nami "A little Thousand Sunny? This Franky never stop suprising me. (She grabs it, shaking the shruken crew) Look at those details. It's the perfect copy of the real one. And he even built small figures of the crew. Who can move. And talk. And yelling my name... Wait a minute!

She looks where the ship used to be, only finding the ship missing.

"Wait, is this means... Guys?!"

"Yes Nami, we are here" said Chopper.

"How did you became that small?!"

"Well, as I see from my lookout, a woman was on the beach. She fired a strange pink ray on our direction, and we shrunk at this size."

"A ray?" said Nami "This is obviousely a devil fruit ability"

"But how are we going to do for found this woman now?" asked Zoro

"Don't worry. I'm the only person who has not been shrunk, so I'm going to find her and teach her a lesson she is not going to forget."

"Yeah!" said Luffy, "Go, Mega Nami!"

Nami began to searching the mysterious woman through the jungle, the Thousand Sunny and the crew now resting in her backpack.

Suddenely...
15133212.title: Mysterious woman! Nami on the way to save the day!

choices: Sounds like a Lot of Work
1513322.content: Here's an interesting idea. What if an entire island shrank? The details can be entirely up to you but there's an entire island downsized.
1513322.title: An entire island?

15133221.content: So a whole island will shrink eh? Okay, I'll give this one two storylines.
15133221.title: The Shrinking of an Island

151332211.content:
Things were oddly tense one day at Amazon Lily. It was usually an active island, full of a large assortment of women: large and small, thin and fat, beautiful and ugly, all of them living in harmony doing what it took to keep their lifestyle. But that wasn’t the case today. Not a single one of the women were to be seen throughout the entirety of the island. The usual hectic life of women trading, hunting, and casually working wasn’t there. The animals were as lost as the people that didn’t seem to be present. None of them had even the slightest idea what could’ve happened. But there was a tense feeling in the air that prevented any of them from so much as approaching the village. The empty buildings seemed to radiate bad omens.

----

“Ugh…Where am I?” Sandersonia, an Amazon resembling a snake mumbled to herself. She was stirring awake from slumber but she didn’t remember every going to sleep. Behind her came a familiar grumble that sounded like her sister.

“Sandersonia…? Is that you? Where are we?” The bulkier Amazon slowly rose to her feet and shook her head. “Last thing I remember was Boa throwing a tantrum.”

“That’s all I remember too. Luffy turned her down again and it got her in a big rage. She was screaming at everyone.” Sandersonia began to turn to face her sister. Though the moment she did she gasped, her snake-like tongue sliding out in sheer shock.

Marigold raised an eyebrow. “What’s wro-“ She turned around and saw exactly what her sister saw. An entire horde of people, the entire population of Amazon Lily, were all collapsed on the ground much like Sandersonia and Marigold were. Over a hundred trained warriors, all laying on the floor like they were nothing. Relief came quickly though as many of them began to slowly stir themselves awake.

“Everyone’s okay.” Sandersonia smiled, “That’s a relief.”

“But what happened?” Marigold queried.

One of the Amazons, Marguerite, approached the two, “No idea. The last thing I remember was Hebihime screaming at everyone and-“ At the mention of Hancock they all froze. The entire population of Amazon Lily realized it at once, “Where is Hebihime?!” Sure enough, nowhere in the group was Hancock to be found. The Amazons all showed signs of panic.

“They took her!”

“Who?!”

“How dare they?!”

Similar statements arose en masse but the two sisters Sandersonia and Marigold slowly riled them down. “It’s okay.” Sandersonia assured, “This is our leader, the Shichibukai we’re talking about here. She’s fine. What we should focus on is figuring out where we are and what to do.”

At that the Amazons looked to their surroundings analytically. The land they were in…looked odd. The ground was hard as rock and the sky seemed almost golden in color. Enormous structures arose almost everywhere, going on for what seemed like hundreds of miles. In fact the field they seemed to have found themselves on went on for what seemed like forever. As far as the eye could see. Several miles ahead of them sat another structure, this one not gold, but purple. It arose many miles itself but was significantly smaller than the enormous pillars in the distance.

“I think it’s some sort of giant island.” Marigold scratched her head.

“Like Eblaf?” Marguerite asked.

“Not Eblaf.” Sandersonia frowned, “I’ve been to Eblaf, it was nowhere near this big…Nor this familiar…”

“You got that feeling too? I feel like I should know this place.” Marigold looked around some more. That’s when it happened.

“Are you microbes done wasting time?”

A voice, louder than any physical comprehension, echoed across the land. The vibrations of which alone was enough to move several small hairs on the Amazons heads. It seemed to come from heaven itself and carried the tone of power that made many cringe at the mere sound of it. But the people of Amazon Lily heard that voice before; they practically worshipped its owner. Even magnified to the extent it was impossible to recognize, they somehow recognized it.

“Hebihime!” All the Amazons cheered.

“Silence!” Hancock’s immeasurably loud voice shouted. She was clearly still mad. “Do you know where you are?” Chatter began amidst the Amazons; no one was brave enough to answer in the negative. Hancock sighed, though at the magnitude it sounded more like a hurricane. “Maybe this will make it more obvious.”

The endless wall of purple that laid several miles ahead shifted, it moved and seemed to break apart into two separate walls of purple. The second wall, resembling a pillar, landed on the hard ground with a seismic boom that knocked several Amazons off balance. The only difference was now there was the unmistakable pale-ish coloring of skin between some of the purple. It started fairly high up, at least a few miles and continued along even higher than the purple wall, in fact the purple wall almost covered it like a curtain. Between the two purple pillars there it was, completely unmistakable. Boa Hancock’s face, gigantic beyond scale, looming over them. She had to have been hundreds of miles high at least, but there was no mistaking that beauty.

It all clicked at once. The Amazons looked to their surroundings and realized it. The ground was the hard-tiled floor, the “golden sky” was the palace and the endless pillars were the pillars that supported the building as well as all the small decorations. Before them was the purple, Hancock’s heels that rose up many miles before showing her bare leg, surrounded by the purple dress she was wearing. They couldn’t see any of her skin before because her legs were crossed, but when she uncrossed them they could see her skin. Past her legs they could see more of the “pillars” that supported the throne she sat on. Boa Hancock was, to them, a giantess.

The sheer realization of it all made many of the Amazons collapse, “We-We…Shrank?” Marguerite looked up to their Queen overhead with clear confusion. Even Marigold and Sandersonia, who knew Hancock better than anyone, were astounded by this turn of events. What could have possibly happened?

Hancock pulled herself back into a regal position on her throne, “I need not explain what happened to a bunch of microbes such as you. All you need to know if that I will slowly grow you back if you do everything I say. If not then I’ll continue to shrink you, if not crush you altogether. Do I make myself clear?”

There were a bunch of gaps that needed to be filled. Not even the blind followers of Amazon Lily could follow such a command without uttering the simple question, “Why?”

When they asked, Hancock’s brow twitched in annoyance. “You’re supposed to say “Yes Hebihime.” And never ask questions. Or have you all forgotten your place?” Hancock hovered a hand between her legs, over the shrunken population of Amazons. “It seems I need to remind you all who is in charge.” An eerie light escaped the giantess’ palm and enveloped all of the Amazons in its pink glow. It felt similar to Hancock’s Mero Mero no Mi powers, but since they weren’t turning to stone it was clearly something different. The details weren’t that important such much as what happened. Every single Amazon gasped as the wall of Hancock’s heels that rose op several miles into the air rose even higher. They continued to rise until they seemed to be as tall as Hancock prior to the shrinking; the woman herself now appeared planetary in size.

“Now that I’ve made my point I hope you all understand now. After all, to cross someone of my beauty is a crime of the highest offense.”

This time everyone was ready to agree, “Yes Hebihime!”

They had learned, but Hancock still frowned. “I changed my mind, since you’re all less than microbes to me now Hebihime is much too informal. From now on address me as Goddess Hancock.”

“Yes Goddess Hancock!” To try and appease their new Goddess all the Amazons bowed to her, not that she could see from her perch on the throne.

“Good, I like the sound of that.” Hancock softly smiled. “Now your Goddess wants you to kiss her heels. Do it now before I get impatient!”

The sudden order had every Amazon pushing to try and appease their leader. They all took off full speed for Hancock’s heels dozens of miles away. But that was the problem, the distance was several miles and even to the Kuja Amazons this would take at least ten minutes. In a surprisingly considerate moment though, Hancock didn’t seem to criticize them for this shortcoming. She just patiently awaited the submission of all her people.

Considering what they had all experienced, the story was slowly piecing itself together in the Amazons minds. After having been rejected by Luffy Hancock used this new ability of hers to take her frustration out on all those around her, the village of Amazon Lily. She could obviously hear them so they could vocally worship her too. Now they had to appease her or else they’d be crushed. It was taking the power she had to a whole new level, but not a single Amazon dared to question it. In fact, few of them even thought of it as wrong. After all, she was beautiful. And her beauty meant that she could get anything she wanted. If she wanted to be a Goddess, who were they to stop her? It was the mindset of the Kuja tribe since Hancock took her place as Queen; the only difference was now she was literally big enough to crush them.
151332211.title: Goddess Hancock

choices: Hancock gives them an impossible task so she could shrink them further
Hancock gives them a simple task, so the Amazons might get slightly bigger
1513322111.content:
(Sorry, writing this chapter it ended up WAY longer than I thought so I had to split it up into two parts.)

Finally they began to arrive at Hancock’s feet where the Amazons delivered their affection through kissing the purple heels that went up to the heavens. Many of them actually relished being able to touch their beautiful leader like they were. It was a privilege to be able to worship Hancock.

However after mere minutes Hancock’s heels rose into the air, where she kicked them off a countless distance away. Each heel landed with a boom that made giants sound like ants. Her feet now bare, Hancock lowered them back her people. She didn’t check to see if she was accidentally going to crush any of them so when her foot came back down there was actually a thin strip of Amazons between it and the floor. Most of them were able to get away just fine. But one, young Amazon, was petrified as she looked up to Hancock’s flawless foot. She was unable to move and when it finally came, she was crushing beneath the ball of Hancock’s left foot. The splatter of her blood and organs was horrible to watch. It served to further send the message of how much power Hancock had over them.

Everyone was much too small for Hancock to feel their insignificant struggles beneath her soles, and she honestly didn’t care. “I realize you microbes are worthless but do try to let me feel your worship of my feet.” Silently the Amazons went back to kissing their Goddess’ feet, only a couple of them taking the time out to pay respects to their departed friend.

To them, Hancock was flawless in every way. Even in rage she resembled a deity of beauty. Her feet exemplified that. They were flawless. Dirt seemed nonexistent even by their microscopic sights. Every single print was perfectly curved and in no way damaged. It was just the right length balancing long and wide with toes that had the same balance. Her toenails were not painted but the natural nails themselves looked perfect enough to have been painted. And lastly, no odor. Hancock’s feet smelled beautifully, like roses. Even with each toe rising an even hundred-miles in the air at least, the women of Amazon Lily would gladly submit to these toes. Hancock was just that beautiful.

The worship of Hancock’s feet went on for at least half an hour, almost every Amazon massaging in some way on top of kissing. The Goddess made no signs she felt their worship, but that just served to push them even harder. Time lost all meaning until finally, their Goddess was satisfied.

“You may stop now.”

All the Amazons stopped and stepped away from the looming feet before them.

“Now, thank your Goddess for allowing you this honor to worship her beauty.”

Almost immediately each Amazon bent on their knees and fervently bowed to give praise to Goddess Hancock. “Thank you Goddess!” Hancock crossed her legs with a smug smirk as they thanked her for their humiliation. Their devotion to her was almost completely blind. Anyone who dared to cross her refused to for fear of being crushed.

“Who’s the most beautiful Goddess in existence?”

“You Goddess Hancock!”

Hancock chuckled, “Very good. I think my lovely little slaves are in need of a rewards…” She paused for a moment, “Would you like to shrink further and bask in more of my glory?”

The question made the Amazons stop and look at one another, unsure of how to respond. Deny what Hancock is offering or take it? Either way odds were they were going to shrink. With that in mind everyone began to cheer in the affirmative. Better make Hancock happy than mad.

The Goddess smiled, “I’d be happy to oblige.” With another wave of her hand Hancock enveloped everyone in the pink energy again. The Amazons looked up in awe as once again, Hancock become bigger to their eyes. Her big toe alone matched the moon in size, and Hancock herself seemed almost as big as an entire universe. They couldn’t even see past half of her big toe now she was so big. Several Amazons began to wonder if Hancock would ever actually make them bigger again.

From her perspective, Hancock looked down by her feet and suppressed laughter. She looked as hard as she could, but the entire population of Amazon Lily, over two hundred people, weren’t even visible by her feet. They were nothing in comparison to her. The only reason she knew where they were was because of the ability she used to shrink them.

“Now. It is time for your next duty to your Goddess…” Hancock smirked.
1513322111.title: Worshipping the Goddess

choices: Hancock makes the Amazons fight against one another for her amusement
The Amazons have to fight off Hancock's finger until she says so.
15133221112.content:
There was a brief pause before Hancock continued, “Thus far you all have been more than obedient. For that I will make this next task simple enough.” Once more the titaness paused, this time to briefly raise her big toe and drop it back to the ground. A simple motion often done without realizing it, but to the shrunken Amazons it demonstrated how frail and weak they were to their Goddess. Hancock’s toe rose into the air and even that created a breeze that blew back the Amazon’s hair. Once it came back down it created a boom loud enough to force most of the Kuja to cover their ears, not mentioning the tremendous quake it created that knocked the women off their feet.

Any struggles by her slightest movements went completely unnoticed by Hancock. She could communicate with them and was aware of where they were, but that was all. She couldn’t see how much even a movement of her toe affected them. “While you are all down there I want you to appease my toe. Since you just finished kissing my feet I can only think of one alternative. To clean them. However I will not allow the rags you germs call clothes to touch my beautiful skin, so you must use your tongues.” There was a brief pause where Hancock drummed her toes, once more causing quakes and winds that terrorized her shrunken slaves. “I’m not cruel though. At your size I know my entire foot is impossible, so just focus on a single toe for now.”

Hancock didn’t have to repeat herself, the Amazons all rushed to lick Hancock’s big toe. The taste of their Goddess seeped into their taste buds, a taste of beauty and a hint of vanilla lotion. It was sublime, if not mildly humiliating to anyone who didn’t worship the ground Hancock walked on. They just hoped their worship would be enough to make her happy; after all to clean the entire toe was impossible. In light of their recent size downgrade the Amazons were much more fervent in their attempts to worship Hancock. Even if she sounded relatively kind they knew she expected the same sensation as if they hadn’t shrunken at all. They had to work harder to make up for the size difference. Even with each insult Hancock tossed at them, microbe, germ, slave, they took it and worshipped her for it. Not just because she was beautiful (Though that was a large reason), not because they were used to appeasing their impossible-to-please leader (Again, a big reason), but because if they ever wanted to be normal again they would have to do every single thing Hancock asked without remorse. That was the dedication the Kuja were known for. Hancock was a cruel goddess would had already taken one of their lives beneath her feet. But she was their leader and they would do whatever she said. Self-preservation was secondary.

Atop her throne Hancock allowed a soft smile to form. It was barely noticeable but her big toe definitely felt good. She could feel each and every one of her slaves paying her the tribute she deserved. It slowly chipped at the anger the Hebihime was known for. Perhaps her pets were due for a slight reward afterwards; an actual reward, not the reward that was more of a punishment. The Goddess looked to her hand briefly contemplating it. It was during the two-years after Whitebeard War Hancock had learned of a secondary power to the Mero Mero no Mi. On top of turning people to stone if combined with the proper degree of Haki it carried a size-changing attribute. It took a year to fully develop, but now Hancock could use it at will. She had yet to show anyone else the technique; that is, until today. If the feeling of her toe was any indication Hancock wondered why she waited so long to use it.

Her eyes shifted to her big toe. As far as the eye could see there was nothing there at all, but she knew that the entirety of the Kuja were there. But to not even see a single speck? Perhaps I overdid it a touch. The Kuja Empress thought to herself. Her people were devoted to her but to remain so devoted even in this situation, it actually impressed even Hancock. Only one Amazon ever dared to cross her and that was the previous leader, Elder Nyon. Who, conveniently, Hancock didn’t shrink to avoid any annoyances. On occasion other Amazons have displayed a slight disobedience, such as Marguerite to save Luffy. But there wasn’t a single sign of resistance. In retrospect Hancock could admit her anger towards her fellow Amazons regarding Luffy may have been slightly misplaced. Her beauty meant she could do whatever she wanted but perhaps her villagers didn’t need to be shrunken that small.

Hancock eventually broke her thoughts to turn her attention back to the worshippers at her feet, “You may now stop.” The feeling on her toe stopped and she could sense that the Amazons had backed away. “Considering how well you have all been following my orders I think a reward is in order.”

The giantess hovered her hand over the general area around her foot again. The shrunken Amazons braced themselves, unsure if they would be shrunken further again or not. To their pleasant surprise, once the pink energy of the Mero Mero no mi enveloped them the world was actually growing smaller. The hundred-mile high toe that belonged to Hancock grew drastically smaller. By the end of their growth, the Kuja Tribe now saw the wall of flesh as only a single mile tall. They still had to be smaller than an inch, in fact probably a lot less, but compared to their previous size they felt like giants. They were now visible even to Hancock, admittedly a large array of specks to her, but visible specks.

The giantess raised the foot she had worshipped and crossed it over her leg. She didn’t say anything but her shrunken slaves seemed to understand. Each speck got on their knees, “Thank you Goddess Hancock.”

“Just realize the bigger you are the more I expect from each of you.” Hancock smiled. “But let’s just say continue what you’re doing.” And there it was. Hancock’s bitter rage was melting away and in its place she resembled their typical ruler. Still by all means mean, but nice enough unless crossed. So long as they didn't upset her they could be normal again soon.

Hancock thought to herself for a moment, “Thus far I’ve done nothing but have you all at my feet. It’s grown boring, so I think for this next task I’ll be asking for something different.” The giantess continued to think, unsure of what to do next. Meanwhile by her feet the Kuja took the chance for some much needed rest. Pampering the gigantic Hebihime was quickly taking its toll on them. If they wanted to keep growing they had to take every chance to rest that they could.

It was after several minutes Hancock finally spoke up again, “I have no particular needs for now but I have grown bored. So you all shall entertain me.” A single fluid motion Hancock bent over from her throne and placed her hand along the ground. To the Amazons it was an incredibly high wall but at least one that was scalable. They wasted no time in beginning to climb to her open palm. It took less than a minute for the talented warriors; good considering how impatient their Goddess was known to be. Hancock rose back to her position on her throne and deposited the Kuja all along the edge of her armrest. Up close she could actually make them out much better, even make out specific people. Hancock rested her hand along her chin and stared at the shrunken women. “As I said you shall entertain me.” The shrunken Kuja awaited what Hancock would ask of them, almost nervously.
15133221112.title: Rewards

choices: Hancock rewards the last four who remained (Marigold, Sandersonia etc)
Before she proceeds a particulary foolish Kuja accuses Hancock of cheating.
151332211122.content:
As the giantess trailed off she removed her hand from her chin and placed it back on the armrest. It was just long enough to leave room for both her arm and the shrunken Kuja, though Hancock’s fingers did come dangerously close. The miles of finger each casually drummed along the throne armrest with loud taps that screeched beyond belief to the shrunken ones. Each digit rose far above the Amazons even rested on the ground. In fact should she choose it Hancock could literally crush all of the amazons with a single press of her finger. That wasn’t her intention of course, but it wasn’t too far off. Hancock raised her index finger and nudged her hand forward slightly. “The game is simple. I will press against you all with my finger. All you have to do is keep my finger at bay through whatever means necessary. The game ends either when I win or when my finger gets tired. Do you understand?”

Naturally each shrunken Amazon answered in the affirmative just to agree with their Goddess. How hard could it be? Hancock would undoubtedly take it easy so she wouldn’t crush each of them; plus the Kuja were some of the strongest pirates in the Grand Line. With over two hundred they definitely had the power to hold their own. But their opponent was Hancock, their leader. She was the strongest of them for a reason. At the very least she had the most stamina. Would it be as easy as they thought?

There was no time for doubts as Hancock began to slowly bring her finger forward. “Let’s go.” She spoke with an impatient tone of authority. All of the Kuja braced themselves as a gigantic finger several miles-long loomed overhead. Each print had room to fit several houses within and still have plenty to spare. Up close it was clear they were right to brace themselves. As the digit began to lower all of the Amazon’s raised their hands to try and hold off the massive appendage. Each one of them utilized their own personal skills effectively in an instinctive strategic manner. Marigold and Sandersonia shifted to their snake forms courtesy of their Devil Fruits and took places as the main pillars in their defense. Around them was a line of the strongest Amazons in Amazon Lily, those capable of Haki, notable faces among them included Marguerite, Aphelandra, and Kikyo. These women utilized their Haki to provide an extra boost of strength. Aside from them the other members of the Kuja huddled together in groups, using numbers to make up for their individual failings compared to their best. Each and every Amazon positioned them where Hancock’s prints would be so they wouldn’t simply be caught between them. The only exceptions were Marigold and Sandersonia, who were big enough they could still help from within there. Most amazing of all was how quick it all happened. It was instantaneous. Showing why they were renowned for their fighting. The only question was; would it be enough to stop one as gigantic as their goddess?

As it would turn out, it was. Their efforts were successful and Hancock’s finger stopped moving. All of the Amazon’s allowed a smile, they had a chance after all! It was just a matter of outlasting Hancock til either she got tired or bored. That meant they could be there for a while. Sweat started to show on several women’s brows from holding off the immense form above them, but no one faltered. Not yet.

Hancock smirked as she felt each of her servants struggle to fend off her finger. They had been grown big enough she could actually feel each of them, all of their little hands holding up her finger. It was entertaining if not just to see them struggle against her. But they had no idea of one crucial fact. Hancock was not actually pushing. All this weight they were holding off, it was just her finger. Once she had it above them Hancock stopped holding it above them. It fell naturally. The only factor in play was gravity. All of these tiny women were going above and beyond just to lift a single finger. Not fight against it, lift it. At any moment the gigantic Amazon could add the slightest pressure and they would all fall in seconds. It had only been a couple minutes but it was clear each of the women beneath her were struggling just to make it to the next second. The power she had over them made Hancock smile slightly.

But as nice as power over hundreds of people was, she was also slightly disappointed. When she came up with this game Hancock expected…well she expected more. She actually thought she’d have to use a slight amount of pressure. But none at all? It was almost disgracefully weak and more importantly, it was making the game dull very fast. Maybe I should make it more interesting. The Goddess smiled to herself. With careful concentration she slowly slid the absolute smallest amount of energy into her finger and gently channeled more of her shrinking technique over each of the Amazons. It was a minimal level of exposure, weak enough to make any size difference as gradual as it could be. If she wasn’t even going to try she was going to make it fun one way or another.

At first Hancock’s trick went unnoticed; all of the Kuja kept their positions like they had been for several minutes. But after roughly another minute it was clear something had changed. The massive form they had held at bay was suddenly pushing harder. Several women fell to their knees, still weakly holding off Hancock’s finger. The closer it got the bigger it seemed to get. In fact it looked almost a third bigger than when they had started, and it only seemed to get bigger. One by one Amazons fell to their knees, unable to hold up the finger anymore. The vast army of warriors dwindled down to a group of four who could stand. Marigold, Sandersonia, Marguerite, and Alphelandra. These were the only Amazons who still stood to fend off Hancock’s expanding finger. All others had collapsed and were barely even on their knees.

Their efforts were admirable, but it didn’t change the fact that the next second Hancock’s finger fully fell and overcame the Amazons.

BOOM

“I win.” Hancock chuckled. The woman removed her finger from her throne, beneath it laid the horde of women all flat on their backs, toppled by a mere finger. As she pulled it away Hancock noted that her technique shrank them to roughly half of what they started at. It was actually rather impressive they held on for so long with such a handicap. Feeling their desperation towards the end really improved things; Hancock couldn’t deny she enjoyed herself. One by one the Amazons began to stand back up and turn to face their Goddess. They seemed to be getting the hang of things as most of them entered a bowing position. Hancock smirked, “You did admirably. But against a beautiful goddess you were doomed from the start. But for bugs, it was impressive.”

“But you lost so I am afraid I won’t grow you anymore for that. Though for your valor I think I know what to do…”
151332211122.title: Battle Against Boa Hancock

choices: For now Hancock allows the four to get their own worship
They can do that later. Hancock has them continue to worship her.
1513322111221.content:
Hancock pulled her hand back to give some room to her servants, “Sandersonia, Marigold, Marguerite, and Aphelandra step forward.” Amidst the exhausted shrunken amazons the four who were named looked to one another with mild confusion. A shrugging Sandersonia took the first step and soon all four of them walked until they were a decent distance away from the others. They didn’t know what to expect but there was a definite sense of optimism since they did the best in their Goddess’ little game. These feelings only got stronger when the gigantic hand of said Goddess loomed overhead, casting a now familiar beam over them.

Around them the world seemed to shrink drastically. The hand that seemed a dozen miles away now seemed only a strong jump away. The giantess who loomed over them was actually recognizable, there was no more blur after so much distance. Her appearance seemed clear and her size actually came off as almost under whelming after being so small before. With this growth the four women smiled and allowed some joy. With this next growth they were closer to being returned to normal. Marigold and Sandersonia gave each other a soft look that seemed to communicate for them. Aphelandra began to jump up and down in a child-like way and Marguerite just smile softly.

After a minute the growth ended, leaving the four Amazons standing at least a couple inches high. Compared to their micro stature before it was heavenly. Hancock lowered her hand back down, revealing they actually stood about twice the height of her fingers as they laid flat. Being Amazons the actual size between the four varied. Marguerite was the size of a notably tall woman, but nothing special. Marigold and Sandersonia were about twice Marguerite’s height. And towering over all of them was Aphelandra, standing at three times the standard height. This was always the case and didn’t matter to them at all. Though to the remaining untouched Amazons this size difference was startling.

Curious about how her friends would look like this, Marguerite casually walked over to her fellow Kuja. To them each of the blonde’s steps was a small boom that created gentle quakes. When her foot stopped in front of them they saw that they were the size of her toes. The new perspective made Marguerite let out a small amazed gasp, which her fellow Amazons all shared. Aphelandra soon joined her, standing beside Marguerite. The child-like woman towered over all her friends like they were bugs. If they matched Marguerite’s toes in size then compared to Aphelandra they were a third their size. Back near Hancock’s hand Marigold and Sandersonia also towered, their heights somewhere in the middle.

“You all look so cute!” Aphelandra knelt over and gently poked one of the Kuja, knocking the woman over by accident. “Oh! I’m so sorry!” She began to bow her head repeatedly in apology, making her enormous breasts bounce in a way that drew everyone’s attention.

“Careful you two.” Sandersonia stepped forward with her sister. “We may be small but to them we’re like giants. If we aren’t careful we could crush someone under our feet.” Marguerite and Aphelandra nodded, the latter slowly backing away to be safe. Before anything else could happen the booming voice of their Goddess echoed.

“Are you done yet? This is my gift to you.”

The four Amazon’s knelt towards Hancock, their smaller friends doing likewise. “Thank you Goddess.”

Hancock proceeded without even acknowledging them, “I’m tired of having to do everything myself so from this point onward you four are to be my Emissaries. Essentially all you have to do is handle those beneath you and make sure I am properly worshipped. Instead of me having to constantly give out orders you will take care of it.” A massive finger pointed to them, “I have many needs that you must do on a daily basis, should you fail I will shrink you smaller than ever before. Understand?”

“Yes Goddess.”

Hancock leaned her head back and smiled, “Good, now allow me to list your duties. For now I shall handle my own eating arrangement since you’re still so small but I still expect entertainment. I expect proper care of my feet, licking them clean, appeasing them with kisses, and simply bowing to their greatness. Likewise with my heels, I expect them cleaned regularly, as well as the floor. Along with that I want my neck massaged once a day. And if I need something you will bring it to me. Anything else and I’ll simply order it.”

Once again the Amazons repeated, “Yes Goddess.” Though their tone said they weren’t sure if they could handle all the chores.

“And most importantly of all…” Hancock proceeded, “If any of you disrespect your Goddess I want one of my Emissaries to execute them on the spot. Do I make myself clear?” The rhythmic chant of agreement came as always. This rule wasn’t new; Hancock always used her powers to essentially turn any who doubted her to stone. Nine times out of ten it was an execution sentence. “Good, now perhaps I can offer some motivation. For each day you successfully do as I ask to completion I will restore some of your size. I realize I’ve been changing it a lot recently but that won’t always be the case.” The giantess seemed to pause, almost as if the next thought amused her. “Also, each of my Emissaries are to be worshipped as well. The exact means is up to them but from what I’ve seen they are something to be aspired to. Until you reach their level they are better than you. And of course I reign over all of you as your Goddess.”

The last part threw many off, but the universal chant came all the same. “Yes Goddess!”

Hancock smiled, “Excellent. Now welcome my new Emissaries.” Sandersonia, Marigold, Marguerite, and Aphelandra all gasped as their fellow Amazons, all their friends, bowed to them as if they were the goddesses. It gave them a feeling of empowerment. They had the authority to boss these people around any way they wanted. The thought crossed each of their minds but none of them had anything like the cruelty Hancock often showed in mind.

“I can kinda get used to this.” Marguerite smiled, sliding a hand on her hip.

“It definitely feels nice.” Agreed Sandersonia.

“They’re all so little! I bet we’ll have lots of fun together!” Aphelandra giggled like a child.

“But they’re still people. Don’t forget that.” Marigold muttered.

Marguerite gently brought her foot before some Kuja, “I know I know, but while we have the chance we might as well try it out right?” She wiggled her toes eagerly, “Kiss my foot.” Like the obedient warriors they were, several Kuja Amazons stepped forward and began to plant their lips along Marguerite’s toes. Now whether it was because of her order, or Hancock’s, wasn’t clear. But either way the pleasant feeling made the blonde Amazon sigh, “I think I’m going to enjoy this.”

“Me too!” Aphelandra piped in. Marguerite turned to see her gigantic friend playfully squeezing a couple Amazons in her bust.

“They practically have to worship five girls now.” Sandersonia laughed alongside her sister.

“But don’t forget who’s the Goddess!” Over all of them Hancock leered with a powerful expression.
1513322111221.title: Hancock's Emissaries

15133222.content: Yes, other than our Strawhats crew? Like other pirates and/or marines? You decide~!
15133222.title: How about shrinking different group?

151332221.content: Which one ya like to choose?
151332221.title: The Marines

1513322211.content:
Ahh the second rank of Marines...Pick one or all three?
(Aokiji, Akainu, and Kizaru are the only well know Admirals, but if ya want add new Admiral, that's fine by me.)
1513322211.title: The Admirals

151332222.content:
It was just another day in the good ol new world of One Piece. The sea was calm, the winds were blowing and The Sun was shining. Yes it was a beautiful day indeed as the Thousand Sunny sailed peacefully through the gentle waters, the crew upon the ship known as the Straw Hat pirates were enjoying a rare day of clarity where they weren’t battling Warlords or escaping Yonko territory, no today was a relaxation day and everyone was taking advantage of it. The captain Luffy was sat on his favorite seat atop the ships Lion Figure Head, Zoro was exercising relentlessly in the weights room, Nami was on deck drawing up a few charts whilst taking in The Sun. Usopp was concocting his latest invention whilst Chopper was say nearby creating rumble balls, Franky was busying himself with minor ship repairs as the Robin sat on a sun lounger reading a book whilst Brook sat on the railing of the ship playing his guitar for all his crew to hear. It was a beautiful day but unbeknownst to the the straw hats that was all about to change as they had just crossed over into the Mystical Sea.

As The Sun set on this glorious day it was getting rather late and one by one the Straw Hats all began to nod off. Robin and Nami headed off to their room to sleep in the comforts of their warm beds whereas the men decided they wanted to sleep under the stars tonight. Brook was given lookout duty for the night and took his place in the birdsnest upon the mast whilst the rest of the crew fell sound asleep on deck, eventually even Brook fell asleep as the Mystical began to show off its wonders. Out of nowhere a pinkish sparkling thin fog covered the Sunny and one by one the fog enveloped every member of the Straw Hats and seeped into their skin. Then as quickly as it came the fog disappeared from sight almost as if it was never there...

The Next Morning

The Sun rose high into the sky and is it did the sound of seagulls cooed loudly in the air awakening our hero’s aboard the ship. As always the first to awaken were the more active members of the crew such as Sanji, Usopp and Franky who had a few chores to attend to immediately such as Breakfast and checking in the ship, however something was slightly off. The crew had awoken on deck were they had fallen asleep except now the deck was the size of an extemely large field and spread far and wide for them to see. It dawned on them instantly. They had Shrunk. Almost on cue Usopp began screaming and panicking at their predicament.

“AHHHHH WHATS GOING ON GUYS WHY IS EVRYTHING SO BIG!!!!!!!!!”

“Calm down Usopp geze we’re never gonna solve anything by running and screaming.

“Damn right Sanji we’ve got a SUPPPPPERRRRRR big problem right now”

As the two calmed Usopp down his yells had woken up the remaining Straw Hats on the deck as Luffy, Zoro and Chopper rose from their slumber.

“What are you guys telling about so early in the morning. Some of us are trying to sleep”

Zoro began speaking but then recognized the situation they were in...everything was huge and they were not. Unfortunately Luffy and Chopper noticed too and had different reactions than Zoro.

“Awesome this is so cool! Look how big everything is! Did we accidentally end up on a giants ship or something???” Luffy blurted out with stars in his eyes.

“WHATTTTT!!!!! A giants ship!!!!! That’s awful we could get killed by their giant footsteps oh what are we gonna do what are we gonna do?!?!!”

Chopper began acting just like Usopp as he was running around panicking as Sanji and Franky tried to calm them down as Luffy continued cooing over his giant surroundings. Zoro however was the first to state whatbhad really happened.

“No Luffy I don’t think we’re on a giants ship, look up their that’s out jolly Rodger on the flag pole.”

The guys all craned their necks skyward as they squinted to seenthatbwhat the swordsman has said was true and that this really was their ship just bigger, Luffy suddenly got serious and spoke accordingly.

“Guys. I think I know what happened...The Ship Grew.”

Immedietly Luffy was struck over the head by everyone as they scolded him for this stupid summary. No what had happened was that the crew had shrank but the question remains was how? Beofre the men could think it through they were interrupted by some booming sounds approaching from the distance. Louder and louder the booms got until the opening of a door could be heard. At once all the Straw Hats shuddered as put came both Nami and Robin as beautiful as ever except the size of giants!!!! They were so huge in fact that the crew must only be about an inch tall compared to the two! As everyone else looked at their two gigantic crew mates the worst happened. They started walking towards them.

BOOM! BOOM!BOOOOOOOM!!!!!!!!

Each footstep they room was louder and stronger than the one before it and soon their steps caused minor earthquakes for the tiny men and soon they turned to major tremors that knocked them all of their feet. All of them tried shouting up at the two titanic ladies but it was to no avail as thy couldn’t hear the at their tiny size. As everyone made to get out of their path so as not to be crushed under their soles, Sanji stood with hearts in his eyes and a assivd nosebleed as he stared in awe at the towering beauties approaching him, closer and closer they got until Nami raised her foot directly over Sanjinand brought it down over the tiny chef who stood not even attempting to move out of the way, he would have been crushed had it not been for the timely arrivals of Luffy’s arm stretching and grabbing him out of the way as Nami narrowly avoided stepping on him. While they regaind their senses the gigantic women began conversing amongst themselves.

“Hmmm I wonder where the boys are they weren’t in their room?” Nami wondered slightly concerned,

“Perhaps they all fell overboard and drowned as we were sleeping” Robin mused casually.

“ROBIN!!!!! Don’t joke like that!”

As the two giantesses talked the rest of the crew sans Brook had hidden out of sight under a chair and began to work out a plan to get the two women's attention.

“Ok so it’s settled? Usopp will fire off a flare and when their attention we’ll scream and shout as loud as we can can got it?” Zoro asked sternly.

“Got it” erroneously answered accordingly...except for one...

“No problem guys I’ll have their attention in no time.”

“WHAT!!!!” The rest of them shouted as Luffy ran off before grabbing onto the leg of the chair.

“Gum-Gum....Rocket!!!!!!!” Luffy shot through the air and towards the two women but all of a sudden the wind picked up and knocked Luffy of course! He was sent plummeting towards the beautiful casemous depths of...
151332222.title: Shrunken Straw Hats Redux

choices: Yes! Robin finds her tiny captain
No! Luffy is in too deep to be seen!
1513322222.content:
The 1 inch tall Luffy soared through the air without a care in the world, despite his fellow shrunken crewmates coming up with a rather practical and safe way to gain the attention of their normal sized or rather giant crewmates Robin and Nami Luffy had decided his way would be more fun...what an idiot. These were the collective thoughts of the rest of the shrunken crew who all had slapped their foreheads in both disgust and shame as they watched their captain take off.

“Oh come on Luffy! We had a plan you moron!” Zoro bellowed.

Then a massive sandaled foot crashed down right next to him knocking him of his feet! Looking up, he saw an orange-haired woman walking towards the helm of the ship. "Luffy! I'm going to take the ship to port at that island town, Take down our flag so we don't scare anyone!" Garrods heart was racing, he was on the Thousand Sunny, The ship of the Straw Hat Pirates! "Why!? Why am I tiny and on the Straw Hats ship!?" He saw Monkey D. Luffy stretch his arms and wrapped them around the mast and launched himself towards it.... faceplanting onto the main mast. Garrod then looked back at the orange-haired woman, (which he presumed to be Cat Burglar Nami) who was face-palming at her captains failure to climb up the mast. "Man, Garrod thought to himself for a pirate captain with a bounty of 500,000,000 berris, he's not too smart."

As they were getting ready to dock Garrod realized that the only way he could've ended up at this size was by Vice Admiral Tiffa's devil fruit! "But why would she do that? And how did I end up here?"
These questions would have to wait until later, you needed to find a place to hide and fast. The Straw Hats had gathered around in the middle area of the ship. "Alright you guys, it's my turn to watch the ship while we restock on supplies, here's a list of things we'll need." The Cat-Burglar gave everyone a long list of supplies. "Make sure that you're disguised so that we don't start anything while we're here."

Everyone left the ship except Nami and a tall woman with black hair that you recognized as the Devil Child Nico Robin. "I'll stay here with you Nami." Robin said. "Sure Robin, I noticed a lot of Marine ships in the area, I'd feel safer if someone else was here with me." Garrod knew that leaving the ship would be a bad idea as he could easily be trampled under the feet of the towns folk if he wandered into town. He hated the idea but he knew that his only option was to try and contact one the women on board the ship.

The only question was, which one?
15521.title: Aboard the Thousand Sunny.....

choices: She slightly stepped and killed you underneath her sandal
155211.content:
Seeing that the only thing that Garrod knew about these two woman were based on their nicknames and their wanted posters, Garrod chose the choice of 'Cat Burglar' Nami. Thinking that the 'Devil Child' Robin would be the worse of the two choices (Oh how wrong he was).

He watched as the black haired woman went inside of the ship's room, disappearing from his line of sight. He saw that Nami was looking through a telescope, scanning the seas for any kind of ships that could be dangerous. Since she was stationary, this was his best chance to get her attention.

He started running towards the giant pirate, sprinting across the lawn on the ship. Even though they were just grass to everyone normal sized. To Garrod, it was like running through overgrown weeds. They were up to his knees and made it quite difficult for him to run. Just as he was about to exit the grass and run across the wooden boards to her. He suddenly realized something. He was still dressed in his marine outfit. If he got her attention now while dressed as a marine, there is no possible way she wouldn't hurt him.

Marines Hate Pirates and Pirates Hate Marines.

Garrod starts taking off all his clothes, getting rid of anything that could make the orange haired pirate realize that he was a marine. He was satisfied and stopped striping, being In his underwear and that's it.

He started to run again and got to the giant sandal of the pirate that almost crushed him a couple minutes ago. He looks at the giant tower of a woman in front of him and contemplates the best possible way to get her attention. The first idea he got was to climb her, a long and tasking journey but ultimately helpful. The second is to bite her foot and grab her attention that way, but that might tick her off when she finds him.

What does Garrod do?
155211.title: Choosing Nami Over Robin

155212.content:
Garrod decided that it would be better for him to go to the most intelligent person on the ship. "Nico Robin would probably be rational enough to not immediately kill me the instant she saw me."

Robin was sitting on a chair under an umbrella reading a book, occasionally taking a drink from the glass on the table next to her. Her sandals were off and she was tapping her foot as she read. When Garrod got to her feet he started to think on ways to get her attention. He decided to just start hitting her soles until she noticed him. Eventually she lowered her foot onto Garrod, not crushing him but instead pinning him to her sandal. He was right under her toes, and she was feeling him with them. Robin giggled to herself, she liked the strange creature that was underneath her toes. She tapped her toes onto it and clenched them together, playing with it.
"What a strange bug, I wonder what it is?"

Garrod wasn't sure what to think of Robins feet. They oddly smelt like flowers and coconuts. She was beating him with her toes but it was kind of like a massage, and the constant rubbing from her feet gave him a tent in his pants."Great, I'm getting an erection from a wanted pirates feet." Eventually she stopped playing with the "bug" and used her Devil Fruit to create an eye in her foot, staring right at Garrod. Then she sprouted arms on the ground and moved Garrod right in front of her face. "Well well, it appears that this "bug" is actually a marine!" She then made smaller arms and grabbed each of Garrods limbs and started examining him. "It would seem that you are just a chore boy, am I right?" She looked more curious than angry, so Garrod didn't feel the need to hide anything. she had sprouted an ear on a smaller arm and moved it in front of his face like a microphone. "Yes I'm a chore boy. Can you please help me? I don't know how I got here or why I'm so small." Robin believed your story, fortunately, but she didn't let you down just yet. "Well either you're the worst spy in the world or you're telling the truth. Either way, you're stuck with me for the time being." Robin's eyes went towards the tent in his pants, making him nervous at how she would react. "I guess you liked my feet huh?" Robin gave him a sly look, clearly planning something. She then dropped him into her cleavage and went back to reading.

"I'll just keep you there for now." Garrod was blushing hard as Robin kept him in her massive cleavage.
"W-why did you--" He was cut off by an arm Robin sprouted on her breasts covering his mouth, "I'm trying to read you know, it's rude to interrupt." Robin said that and pushed her breasts together, making Garrod realize just how insignificant he was to her. "By just pressing my breasts together a little more I could turn you into nothing but a red stain. You wouldn't want that now, would you?" Garrod was starting to regret his decision to contact this pirate, but at least he wasn't dead... yet.

Robins cleavage was tight, Garrod barely had enough room to wiggle, much less move around. Every now and then Robin would giggle when he struggled. The worst part about all of this was that he still had the tent in his pants, being in between these massive breasts was making him harder. Robin felt this and giggled even more, "Looks like I found a perverted bug too."

Robin got up from her chair and started cleaning up her area."Now the only question is... should I show you to Nami? Or should I keep you for myself?"
155212.title: Robin the Devil-Child.....

1553.content:
Name: Liza Bean

Age: 16

Description: Hailing from a race of small people from the island Minitua, this young girl decided to hit the seas and make a name for herself as the first pirate of her people at the age of 14! While hard at first, starting out in a toy boat alone, she is now the captain of a real ship with a capable crew.

The inch tall girl has incredible brute strength for her size, capable of knocking over a giant. Usually wears black short shorts, white tank top with a logo that says meeni! and sandals. She has long purple hair and bright pink eyes. Hasn't eaten a devil fruit yet.
1553.title: OC # 3

15531.content:
"Hold tight, ladies!" Liza screamed, pulling tightly on a rope. The rest of her crew was scrambling around the deck, trying to keep the ship afloat in one of the worst storms they had ever seen. The Grand Line was famous for its destructive weather, and they were trying their best to survive it.

"There! I see a break in the storm!" Manilla, the ship navigator, yelled. She was a chipmunk mink with soft brown fur and pink hair that had been on board for a year.
"Roger!" Caroline yelled, turning the ship starboard. The shark fish woman was their helmsman, and was better at handling the waves than anyone Liza had encountered on the Grand Line.

After sailing in that direction, the crew took a collective sigh of relief as they reached daylight. Cheers erupted from the crew that they survived another storm on the sea. Once to safety, Liza took a look around at all the friends she made since leaving home.

Since leaving home, she had gone through so many adventures, picking up new friends along the way. Currently, she was sailing for the next island on her adventure to become pirate queen. She currently had a bounty of 380,000,000 belli.

What's next for the tiny pirate captain?
15531.title: Mini Mini Pirates!

info.brief_description: A Shrink/Giantess Interactive Story based on the anime One Piece
info.description:
As the title suggests, this is an Interactive surrounding size change and the One Piece universe. The basic rules are pretty simple

-Try to keep the people in character if possible

-Try to avoid killing someone unless they're either a bad guy or it's the end of a storyline.

-The only thing I'll really restrict is toilet material. Anything else will be accepted.

-Try to keep it realistic to the OP Universe. IE: Don't introduce someone like Naruto or someone in real life. OC's however, will be allowed.

-Only girls can be the giant ones. Giant guys can be used in minor roles, but the main point of the interactive is to interact with giant females.

Along with those basic rules also keep in mind that you will be allowed to create your own Devil Fruits to give so-and-so powers. But keep in mind to not repeat any already-made fruits and the fact that the character could no longer swim.

Any sizes are allowed, so a girl could stop at ten feet tall, or become too big for measurement. Similar to a shrunken guy, he can be two feet tall, or be too small to see.

All that being said, enjoy! Rewards will be given to those who add. This can either be GP, another add, or even something in my ability you'd want. It all depends on what you want and how good the add is.
